title: Lawn Mower
info: The Lawn Mower is a tool that can be purchased from the Golfer for 1. It mows normal and Hallowed grass. Mowed grass has a different texture, reduces enemy spawn chance, prevents tall grass from growing, and changes how balls move in golfing. The Lawn Mower deals a fixed amount of 8 damage to critters and enemies only while the player is moving (The 8 damage can still be reduced by armor). When it is used on grass other than normal and hallowed, it only removes weeds and flowers.
